dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4043 IH: To amend the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act to make the District of Columbia eligible for certain wastewater infrastructure grants, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act to make the District of Columbia eligible for certain wastewater infrastructure grants, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 302(c)(1) of the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act (33 U.S.C. 4282) is amended by inserting , the District of Columbia, before or Indian Tribes.
